summary: Installation failed: Your cluster's CIDR ranges overlap with the default Docker Bridge subnet
description: Your cluster's installation has failed due to an overlap with the default Docker Bridge subnet, 172.17. 0.0/16. This failure is only present on 4.5 cluster installs. Please install a new cluster on version 4.6 or higher. For more details, see https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1858342
